dict.acceptation: 安排；给…开账单；为…发提（货）单；把…登录在账；

sent.orig: Bill takes great pride in his work.
Bill and I are overwhelmed by the wealth of lovely linens we have suddenly received.
sent.trans: 不期收到你送的亚麻织品，我和Bill非常不安。

sent.orig: Bill is really glad that he left the surgery behind him.
sent.trans: Bill真的是非常高兴他能够甩掉手术。

sent.orig: Bill rushed to the hospital, where his wife soon joined him.
sent.trans: Bill赶到医院，很快他的妻子在那里与他会合。

sent.orig: Bill can play the violin and dance all at once.
sent.trans: Bill可以在拉小提琴的同时跳舞。
